data: There was the usual welcoming crowd for a celebrity, and the usual speeches by the usual politicians who met him at the airport which had once been twenty miles outside of Croton, but which the growing city had since engulfed and placed well within its boundaries.
Kastle, Herbert D., 1924-1987; Van Dongen, H. R., 1920-2010 [Illustrator]
